### Tender Closing Date

**Important Notice:** Please note that the bid submission deadline and time have changed.

All required supporting documentation and bid submissions must be submitted on **2023-08-01** by **14:00:00** EDT. Any bids submitted after this time will be considered non-responsive.

### Tender Description
-------------------------

The Department of Environment and Climate Change Canada (ECCC) is seeking a new rooftop air handling unit. The required unit should meet the Department's needs and be delivered on **2023-12-31**.

### Contract Details
----------------------

- **Contract Title:** Air Handling Unit
- **Location:** Ottawa
- **Duration:** Until Further Notice

### Selection Criteria
----------------------

Bids will be evaluated based on their price. The lowest-priced bid will be considered the most responsive.

### Trade Agreements
--------------------

This tender is subject to the following trade agreements:

- Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
- Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
- Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
- Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
- Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
- Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
